UPDATE 08/04: To give everyone fair access and help manage our stock, we’re currently limiting orders to a maximum of 24 cans per order.

UPDATE 27/04: Get your pre-orders in for this week’s freshly canned mixed case, shipping Thursday/Friday this week!

UPDATE 28/04: 4-Packs are now available, so you can build your own case! Max 24 cans (or six 4-packs) per case.

DELIVERY INFO

UK delivery is now FREE on orders £50 and over! For other shipping rates please see checkout options.

Orders placed before 12pm Monday – Thursday should arrive next working day.

Deliveries are fulfilled by UKMail (DHL). You will receive an email from DHL with tracking information for your delivery.

Please send all shop-related queries to shop@howlinghops.co.uk.
